title: Bug 41067OLE ref count problem when opening file for read
SR: Bug 41067OLE ref count problem when opening file for read This chunk of code from OleClientSite constructors:OleFile oleFile = new OleFile(file, contentStream, OleFile.READ);IStorage storage = oleFile.getRootStorage();storage.AddRef();// Open a temporary storage objecttempStorage = createTempStorage();// Copy over contents of fileint result = storage.CopyTo(0, null, null, tempStorage.getAddress());storage.Release();if (result != COM.SOK)OLE.error(OLE.ERRORCANNOTOPENFILE, result);oleFile.dispose();
